project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV Files
project_plan.description: This project involves implementing a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file by calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns provided by the user.

task.name: Implement feature to read CSV file and load data
Implement feature to calculate mean for selected numerical columns
Implement feature to calculate median for selected numerical columns
Implement feature to calculate mode for selected numerical columns
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
